bug.author: nyghtowl
bug.description: Issue is that MLN activationMean has not been implemented and renderFilter needs to take in the MLN parameter names vs static "W", "b". To be determine how important this fix is because there is a new version with D3.

comments.comment: Not seen recently and listener UI has been overhauled.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
